programme.desc: Sacred Cup / My Fair Berry - Wanting a better way to drink water, the MOs go on a quest for something previously unknown to them, a cup. / When flowers invite Berry to The Bloomers Ball, Twig, who has a personal vendetta against the flowers, teaches her to be a proper flower, in the hopes of showing them up.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep17
programme.desc: Bad Moon Rising - After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.desc: Sacred Cup / My Fair Berry - Wanting a better way to drink water, the MOs go on a quest for something previously unknown to them, a cup. / When flowers invite Berry to The Bloomers Ball, Twig, who has a personal vendetta against the flowers, teaches her to be a proper flower, in the hopes of showing them up.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert and the Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert and the Octopus Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep47
programme.desc: How Can I Make The Trolley Go Faster? - Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep48
programme.desc: How Can We Mend Baa's Trough? - There's a hole in the bottom of Baa's trough so none of the thirsty friends can have a drink. How can we mend the trough, wonders Jess. Hey, that's the Big Question. Jess decides to ask Horace for help but Horace has a problem of his own. He's trying to make a lovely new musical sound but the square shaped piece of bark he's got doesn't make a very good noise when he clangs it with a stick. Jess borrows the bark to cover the hole in the trough but it's the wrong shape. He decides to ask Mimi for help with making a different shape to cover the hole. Mimi's making a mosaic, but she can't find anything the right shape to fit the square-shaped hole she has. Jess gives her the bit of bark and it fits perfectly! She sings Jess a shapes song explaining all about different shapes around us. Jess finds a squashed clay pot which is circle shaped. It's the perfect shape to mend the hole and because it's clay the water won't leak out again! They've answered the question. And here comes the rain again so the

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Olivia Ep23
programme.desc: Olivia Acts Out - It's time for the annual school play, but Olivia's stuck playing the part of Cow #2, while Francine lands the starring role. It's up to Olivia to make the most of her small part: with a little help from Julian, she choreographs a climactic mooove for herself and has the crowd on their feet.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets / Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep50
programme.desc: Big Silly / Smek Chills Out - Smudge tries to prove to Fox and Stick that his monster friend is real/Julio teaches Smek how to "chill out" but Smek takes it too far

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep50
programme.desc: Peabody's Delivery / Joe Vs. The Peabody And Sherman - While trying to teach Sherman about patience, Peabody agrees not to open a special delivery until after the show. It proves to be easier said than done.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep50
programme.desc: Lucky and the Endless Possibilities - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups Save A Royal Painting - Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Blue's New Pet - It's campaign hamster versus campaign goldfish as the house votes on a new pet! When it's a tie, we play Blue's Clues to figure out who will cast the last (and deciding!) vote.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Sandcastle Calamity / Owl-Ert - Steel upsets a family of sand crabs when he makes a huge sandcastle for Stu and Safia. // Kai rushes through a voice-recognition upgrade on Janice and she ends up mistaking the hoots of a baby owl as commands from Alex, making his gadgets go crazy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Nelly's Hair - The humidity makes Nelly's hair puff up so Nora helps her calm it down.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Dog Loves Billy Goat Gruff - Pug needs help mending his new see-saw. On their adventure our friends meet a Troll who guards an old bridge so that the goats cannot cross it. Dog persuades the Troll to build a new strong bridge.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Pretend Piggy - Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Time For Some Science - It's a rainy day. JoJo wants to go outside to splash in puddles, while Isaiah wants to be inside with his science books. Gran Gran's plan has a new word to learn - compromise!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Float My Boat - A Blocker delivers a boat to Lake Street instead of the lake. Can Team Tinpo ship it back to where it belongs?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Fruit Oops - A Po finds it difficult to sell Froops, because they keep bouncing away.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Circus - Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep6
programme.desc: The Fossil Badge - The squirrels are digging in the garden when they come across a fossil, so Duggee and Narrator explain all about fossils and prehistoric times.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Footprint Badge - The squirrels are playing hide-and-seek, but they can't find Happy. The squirrels follow lots of different footprints that take them to their friend but there is one set they can't work out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Juice Badge - Duggee is going to make the squirrels juice from the garden. Whilst picking the fruit, the squirrels meet a little bug, full of woes about being too small.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Biogas Power - Greener fuel spells trouble for Glitch.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Very Fast Food - Hobart is put in charge of the Tasty Termite but things get out of control.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep82
programme.desc: Stuck - All of the Teletubbies are stuck. Tinky Winky's hand is stuck in the bag, Dipsy's hat is stuck, Laa-Laa's ball is stuck and Po is stuck on the Tubby Slidey!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Yoyo - Dee encourages a friend to say 'yo-yo' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a stripy yo-yo, some spotty yo-yos, a flashy yo-yo and even a peepo yo-yo!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Mae-Mae's Precious Pearl - Mae-Mae finds a very precious pearl on the beach. But when the pearl is taken, the friends must go on a submarine adventure to get it back.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep70
programme.desc: Jimmy Jones Rules - Monty tries to tell his family that Jimmy is not just a toy, but much more. Whether they believe him is another story.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A box full of bits and pieces is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are excited. Duggee and the Squirrels are going to have to work hard to put it all together. Time for a bit of teamwork.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - Duggee is having a lovely cup of tea in his favourite cup when Roly surprises him with a very loud peek-a-boo! It is so loud that Duggee jumps and drops his cup which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Compass Navigators - Can Kyan and Foz use new compass skills to navigate their way out of an academy maze?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Nomads, Mongolia - Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Tree-Hole Frog - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the rainforests of Borneo to find out how the tree-hole frog makes itself heard in a noisy forest.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Passenger Machines - Grace explores three passenger machines! First, Grace gets to grips with a huge car ferry and shows off an eco-friendly solar train. Finally, she drives a fun tuk-tuk.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Captain's Log - Captain Captain entrusts Sandy and Seaweed with her treasured Captain's Log!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Kite Badge - It's a very windy day and the squirrels want to play outside. What can they do? Duggee knows - he's flying his kite. The Squirrels set about making their own kites to fly.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Treehouse Badge - Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the squirrels take refuge in the treehouse, but it's getting a little bit cramped these days. Norrie has an idea - maybe they need to add an extension.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Larry the Floor Manager - Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Game House - Stuck inside the house due to a storm, Simon invents a virtual reality game that quickly gets out of hand.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Little Drummer Boy / Special Ingredient - When Alvin insists on taking over the drums from Theodore, Theodore fights back by mimicking Alvin and stealing his persona. // As Theodore is perfecting a pancake recipe, Alvin plays a trick by pouring burping powder in his next batch.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep519
programme.desc: Alvin Gets Schooled / My Life As a Dog - When Dave learns Alvin blamed him for his poor grades to Miss Smith, Dave sets down a very strict study schedule. // Theodore must pose as a dog after the chipmunks accidently shave the fur off a dog Miss Miller is dog sitting.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Patterfly Effect / A Space Affair to Remember - Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep213
programme.desc: Lost and Found - When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Switch Glitch / Prickly Pests - An accident causes Patrick and Karen to switch bodies. // A mischievous camp prank goes terribly wrong.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep606
programme.desc: A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Day of the Dad / Small Blunder - Lori struggles to make a good impression on Bobby's dad after accidentally pushing him into a puddle. // Desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Fashion No Show / Doom Service - Leni and Carlota's working styles clash when they are both interning for a famous fashion designer, Mariella Moss. // The Louds book a stay at an all-inclusive resort, only to find the vacation is not what they imagined.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Prime Time - Feeling helpless as Robby's condition worsens, Mo wishes she had never touched the Emberstone. Quintus Prime shows the young hero that because of her, the world is a better place.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Vacation Daze - When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Don't Zoo That / Maxed Out - Adelaide and Carl battle it out to win Jr. Zookeeper badges but their fighting might ruin both of their chances. // Hector finds out Vito has a huge tab at the mercado and Vito offers to pay him back - no matter what!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep140
programme.desc: The Monster Who Came to Bikini Bottom / Welcome to the Bikini Bottom Triangle - A monster terrorizes Bikini Bottom until Patrick befriends the huge creature. // SpongeBob and all the Bikini Bottom citizens disappear to an underwater resort.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep141
programme.desc: The Curse of the Hex / The Main Drain - Madame Hagfish puts a hex on the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick search for a legendary drain on the ocean floor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep142
programme.desc: Trenchbillies / Sponge-Cano - SpongeBob and Patrick fall into a cavern where frightful Trenchbillies keep them hostage. // Squidward's complaints trigger a volcanic eruption.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Drooling Fool / Patrick's Got An Alien Zoo Loose - Patrick's uncontrollable drooling gets out of hand and mouth. // A shape-shifting alien runs loose in the Star home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Home Ecch - Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Present Tense - As the annual Winter Festival approaches, Po doesn't have enough money to buy his dad the present he deserves, so he takes a job as a bounty hunter to capture a dangerous escaped convict for the reward. But Po's plan doesn't go as smooth as he hoped.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Bosom Enemies - After dealing Taotie yet another humiliating defeat, Po is horrified to learn that the villainous warthog has had a full on nervous breakdown. Po is determined to heal his spirit and Taotie is eager to change his evil ways...or is he?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep313
programme.desc: The Firebending Masters - Aang is ready to start his firebending training. However, as Zuko attempts to teach him, he realizes he has lost all his firebending power.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: P.E.L.T. - Skipper's losing it. He has to prove he can still lead the squad.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Marble Jar Head / Good Night and Good Chuck - How in the world is Rico supposed to behave well when King Julien has kidnapped his doll, Miss Perky? // When the Penguins try to get the anchor man Chuck Charles back on TV they find themselves in front of the camera.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Sporty Parker / Hammy Time - Parker makes the Yellow Springs soccer team, which thrills Angus since he never had the chance to play growing up. // Parker brings home a hamster the Middlemost Post falls in love with, but this love quickly turns to jealousy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Waterbending Master - The kids reach the Northern Water tribe, and Aang and Katara look for a Waterbending Master as Sokka falls for a princess. Meanwhile, Zhao plans an attack and Zuko must find a way to continue his quest for the Avatar.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Siege of the North Part 1 - The Northern Water Tribe braces itself for an attack by Admiral Zhaos Fire Navy fleet. In the heat of battle, Aang struggles to defend the city. He wonders if there isnt a better way to use his Avatar abilities.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Stage Struck / Ball Count - Best's sound effects threaten to derail Bester's one chance to shine on the opening night of a Flip Flop's play. // Best and Bester's "inbestigation" into some missing golf balls escalates into a full-blown mountain rescue mission.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Bucket Pants / A Best Too Far - Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this year's Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other people's ideas even if they haven't got a war room.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Robot Arms / PB & J - Buhdeuce gets robot arms to help him mine bread, but he ends up having to use them to help everyone else out instead. // The guys adopt a Ponda Bear, who seems like a cute, sweet pet... but he's actually quite the opposite.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Farm Pit / Crock Talk - Dad longs for a simpler life and decides to convert the Turner home into a farm. // When monsters start appearing in Dimmsdale, Mr. Crocker launches a web show to expose them.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Bloomix Power - The Winx train in Aisha's new gym to prepare to fight without powers. Afterward, they return to Lynphea to fight the Treants and a flying Cloudtower. Flora saves her sister Miele, and gains her new transformation Bloomix!

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Hair Flair Fuzzly / The Fuzzlies in the Attic - Mrs. Melvin's hairbrush goes missing, and Abby tracks it to a brand new Fuzzly who loves to style hair. // When the Fuzzly twins, Mo and Bo, get separated in the hotel, it's up to Abby to get them back together again.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep105
programme.desc: There's Only One Bozzly / Cousin Flugtilda - When Bozzly gets hurt, Melvin steps in as Abby's sidekick. // Princess Flug's Cousin Flugtilda comes to visit, and Priness Flug worries that eveyone likes her cousin more than they like her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep49
programme.desc: Krab Borg! / Rock A Bi-Valve - After watching a movie where robots take over the world, Spongebob thinks Mr. Krabs is a robot. // Spongebob and Patrick find a baby clam and decide to raise it as their own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep50

programme.title: What Broke The Rental Market?

programme.desc: Mt. Iwaki in Aomori overlooks an apple orchard where five kitties are born in spring. By summer, they've grown big and strong! Pay them a visit and attend the area's special summer festival!

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition 2023
programme.desc: This episode features female entrepreneurs who are looking to promote their local economies as well as create more sustainable fashion options by creating fruit-based clothing.

programme.title: Dive In Tokyo
programme.desc: Nerima is an area of central Tokyo with a history of agriculture. It is also famous for being the birthplace of Japanese animation. We uncover its past and learn how locals are looking to the future.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: On The Wings 5Min.
programme.desc: Join us on a night flight to admire Japan's stunning views on a journey from Tokyo to Fukuoka. Behold the sublime beauty of Mt. Fuji at sunset and the sparkling night views of major cities.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Gareth Malone teaches singing to people in places where it is uncommon but where the inspiration and unity of music is most needed. He uses choral singing to empower, heal and connect people.

programme.title: Ninja Truth
programme.desc: The ninja are said to have possessed superior physical and mental strength. We'll examine their training methods, and analyze a running style that enabled the ninja to quickly cover ground.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to sleep. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The changing leaves, the transient beauty of the ancient capital in fall. Dive deep into Kyoto, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reading Japan
programme.desc: Reading Japan shares short stories from Japan. Today's episode is "YUKI-ONNA" by Lafcadio Hearn, about a scary story based on a Japanese folktale about a snow spirit said to appear in the winter.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: Frontrunners
programme.desc: FRONTRUNNERS highlights professionals at the very forefront of their field. We showcase their amazing work, discover their motivations, and learn about the challenges they face in the future.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition 2023
programme.desc: This episode features female entrepreneurs who are looking to promote their local economies as well as create more sustainable fashion options by creating fruit-based clothing.

programme.title: Designing Thread
programme.desc: Yamagata / Nakui Naoko (book designer)Thread for traditional "shina" fabric takes a year to make. Ultrafine mohair is also made here, with a 60-year-old device. Nakui admires the hunt for improvement.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: We'll see how optical illusions are being used to study vision processing in brains, both real and artificial. And we'll see a neural network that writes custom music for each listener's brain.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition 2023
programme.desc: This episode features female entrepreneurs who are looking to promote their local economies as well as create more sustainable fashion options by creating fruit-based clothing.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Towada
programme.desc: Towada-Hachimantai National Park comprises the nature-rich Oirase-Keiryu, the crystal-clear Lake Towada, and the lush marshlands of Mt. Hachimantai. It presents nature in its many forms.

programme.title: Kabuki Kool
programme.desc: Kabuki often depicts traditional Japanese dishes. Actor Kataoka Ainosuke introduces scenes with several examples, and teaches us about what foods were popular in the Edo period.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Main Event - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep4
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep18
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Allen vs. Craig
programme.desc: Prelims - In a wide-open middleweight division, every fight is an important one, and on November 18, 185-pound contenders Brendan Allen and Paul Craig collide in a UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas that will set up a huge 2024 campaign for the winner. Winner of five straight with four finishes and a pair of Performance of the Night bonuses, Allen is surging at the perfect time for this fall matchup with Craig, the Scottish submission machine, who announced his arrival to the division in July with an impressive stoppage of Andre Muniz
